page.title: 08A 15 year old on himself.
page.content: {Jon Middleton writes,} My name is Jon Middleton, I am 15 years old and attend Sutherland High school. There are four members in my family, my mother, my father and my younger sister. We live in a time of hign unemployment where standards are important and school qualifications are essential for success. We are governed by a party who inject no hope into the economy and the people, the outlook is depressing. We are surrounded by bad news and disasters. People suffer and yet still our government does nothing. My enjoyment includes watching Manchester United, going roller skating and going to discos. I cannot moan about life in general, my parents have always provided the best for me. My main ambition is to do well for myself and survive in our harsh world.
